short_summary: The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for Gasket Set, Special. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
description: The Contract is for Gasket Set, Special. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
full_summary:
### NSN 12-3253560 GASKET SET, SPECIAL
#### Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the procurement of a Gasket Set, Special (NSN: 12-325-3560), in accordance with the requirements detailed below.

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01015695
* **Publication Date:** December 2, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Region of Opportunity:** Global
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia and British Columbia
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence

### Tender Description

The DND requires the procurement of two lots of Gasket Sets, Special, as follows:

* **Lot 1:** 60 units, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Lot 2:** 40 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars and must provide the following documentation:

* Brand name and model or part number and NCAGE number for any Equivalent or Substitute Product
* Canadian business registration information

### Proposal Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on technical merit, price, and business capacity.

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Xavier McNeill
* **Email:** [xavier.mcneill@forces.gc.ca](mailto:xavier.mcneill@forces.gc.ca)
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Document Availability

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal, are available on the Canada Buys website.

#### Languages of Document Availability
These documents may be submitted in either English or French.

Note that all bid submissions must be in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender documents. Bidders are advised to carefully review the tender documents prior to submitting their bids. [1] 

**Attachments**
